todo.p: This is too much work for one person. I need other contributors to help with this project
todo.toInput: YouTube Vimeo FaceBook TikTok Instagram Tumblr V.Reddit Reddit BitTube Aparat BiliBili Tudou DailyMotion Niconico IQiyi Rumble Youku NSFW sites not listed

ignore.request: Request another entry to add here

docs.p: Tag 1: the name of the service
Tag 2: the link to the service
Tag 4: the owner of the site
Tag 5: Platform content type (shortened to ctype)
Tag 6: info on if the site is still active or not
Tag 7: the start year of the site
Tag 8: the end year of the site (set to Nil if it is still active)
